text: The Kia Sonet is a subcompact Crossover SUV made by Kia since 2020. == History and Features == The Kia Sonet concept previewed the Sonet in February 2020. the production version was debuted in August 2020. and started being sold in September in India its positioned below the Kia Seltos and related to the Hyundai Venue. it has a 1.0 turbocharged 1.2 and 1.5 petrol engine and a 1.5 diesel engine with a 5-speed and 6-speed manual transmission a 6-speed semi- automatic transmission a 6-speed automatic transmission and a 7-speed CVT transmission. == Markets == The Kia Sonet is sold mainly in emergent markets like Latin America Africa Middle East and Asia. == References == Sonet Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Kia Sonet
